mapper.insert:
select SIGNET_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into signet () values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},sysdate,sysdate,null,#{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{netType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{simNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sleepTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{fingerPattern,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update:
update signet
update_date = sysdate,
delete_date = sysdate,
create_date = sysdate,
corp_id = #{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
net_type = #{netType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sim_num = #{simNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iccid = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imsi = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sleep_time = #{sleepTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finger_pattern = #{fingerPattern,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where delete_date IS NULL AND id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: UPDATE signet SET delete_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM signet WHERE delete_date IS NULL AND corp_id=#{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM signet WHERE delete_date IS NULL and uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM signet WHERE delete_date IS NULL

SELECT
FROM signet WHERE delete_date IS NULL AND id=#{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} -- LIMIT 1
